item.title: Heineken 0.0 promotes inclusivity
item.description: Heineken 0.0 is available in Singapore. Heineken 0.0, a non-alcoholic malt beverage with a unique recipe, launched in the US on January 9th. It boasts a distinct, balanced taste and contains only 69 calories per bottle (70 calories per 330ml can). Although announced back in May 2017, it is also currently available in Singapore. Heineken’s Master Brewers created this alcohol-free option using only natural ingredients. Jonnie Cahill, CMO of HEINEKEN USA, believes Heineken 0.
